metadata.title: CVE-2016-2073 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The htmlParseNameComplex function in HTMLparser.c in libxml2 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a craftedXML document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2073` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1').
